root.name: Warhammer Quest
root.description: OverviewWarhammer Quest attempts to bring the classic Games Workshop board game to IOS platforms as a turn based, top down, RPG. Players will face off against classic Warhammer opponents including Orcs, Trolls and Skaven as they attempt to find glory and wealth.CharactersPlayers can initially select from the following characters, featuring the usual Games Workshop confusion between race and occupation:MarauderWood Elf WaywatcherDwarf IronbreakerGrey WizardIt will also be possible to unlock the following characters:Dwarf TrollslayerArchmageWarrior PriestInspirationWarhammer Quest is an adaptation of the classic 1995 boardgame of the same name.
